entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
